description: Steep the tea according to the tea type.
name: Steep Tea
pseudocode: IF tea_type == 'black tea' THEN steep for 3-5 minutes. ELSE IF tea_type == 'green tea' THEN steep for 1-3 minutes. ELSE steep for 2-4 minutes.

description: Brew the tea according to the tea type.
name: Brew Tea
pseudocode: IF tea_type == 'black tea' THEN brew with boiling water. ELSE IF tea_type == 'green tea' THEN brew with water at 170-180°F. ELSE brew with water at 190-200°F.
